original_text: Gad's descendants lived in the region of Bashan, near the people of Reuben's tribe. Their land went as far as Salecah town in the east.
korean_text: 갓 자손은 르우벤 사람을 마주 대하여 바산 땅에 거주하면서 살르가까지 다다랐으니

sentences.original_text: Gad's descendants lived in the region of Bashan
near the people of Reuben's tribe
Their land went as far as Salecah town
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 땅은 살르가 성읍까지 뻗어 있었습니다
